description: Scoring rules for Information Quality Score (IQS) and AI Searchability Score (AIS)

iqs.description: Information Quality Score - measures completeness, freshness, provenance, and field coverage

completeness.description: Percentage of required and recommended fields populated

freshness.description: Recency of last update and source verification

provenance.description: Quality and reliability of source attribution

coverage.description: Presence of key information (eligibility, deadlines, amounts)

ais.description: AI Searchability Score - measures suitability for LLM retrieval and reasoning

languageCoverage.description: Availability in multiple languages including Easy German

metadataRichness.description: Presence of topics, tags, and target groups
